meta.name: description
meta.content: Bloomington Public Schools is distributing grab and go meals at no charge during school closure, including during the stay at home order. Meals are available to all Bloomington students ages 18 and younger.

Bloomington Public Schools is distributing grab and go meals at no charge during school closure, including during the stay at home order. Meals are available to all Bloomington students ages 18 and younger.

img.alt: Two students build structures out of marshmallows and toothpicks

div.p: Bloomington Public Schools are closed through May 4. Grab and go meal distribution for all Bloomington students 18 and younger, and childcare for healthcare and essential workers, is available on all scheduled school days.

Bloomington Public Schools is distributing grab and go meals at no charge during school closure, including during the stay at home order. Meals are available to all Bloomington students ages 18 and younger. Meals can be picked up Monday - Friday.

ul.li: Valley View Middle School, 8900 Portland Ave.
Westwood Elementary, in the bus loop off 109th St
Washburn Elementary, in the bus loop off 85th St.

div.p: The pre-packaged meals include a hot lunch and cold breakfast for the next day, delivered to vehicles (or individuals) while taking appropriate health and social distance precautions.

img.alt: Scroll to top of page icon

div.p: We help students thrive and dreams come alive
